Episodes.Title: Half the Money
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: The coordinated attack on the Duttons continues as everyone searches for answers on who is responsible; Rip delivers on a promise.

Episodes.Title: Phantom Pain
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: John and Kayce discuss the attack. Jamie finds his new home. Beth and Rip have unexpected company.

Episodes.Title: All I See Is You
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: John seeks revenge with help from some unexpected allies. Kayce solves a problem with an unconventional method. Beth gives Carter his options. Jimmy prepares for a change.

Episodes.Title: Winning or Learning
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: Jamie receives some surprising news; Beth receives an offer; Jimmy settles in on the road; tensions boil over in the bunkhouse.

Episodes.Title: Under a Blanket of Red
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: John and Kayce are forced to deal with some newcomers in town; Lloyd is in the doghouse with Rip, and finds purpose in teaching Carter; Jamie seeks information about his father.

Episodes.Title: I Want to Be Him
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: Beth confronts her father's houseguest; Kayce and his family search for a new home; Jamie seeks answers from Garrett; Lloyd loses his cool.

Episodes.Title: Keep the Wolves Close
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: John is put in an awkward position by Gov. Perry; Carter works to earn back Beth's trust; Jamie is in for a big surprise.

Episodes.Title: No Kindness for the Coward
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: Tensions escalate with the protestors, but Beth has a plan; Jimmy and Emily get closer; Monica and Kayce share a special moment.

Episodes.Title: No Such Thing as Fair
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: John and Beth squabble; Jimmy has an important decision to make; Kayce begins a new quest; Jamie realizes Garrett's past might affect his own future.

Episodes.Title: Grass on the Streets and Weeds on the Rooftops
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: To the Duttons, family is everything; however, newfound truths threaten that bond. Jimmy comes home and has important decisions to make. Beth takes family matters into her own hands.
